message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can we meet in the middle at $9,500?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,500 is too low for me. Could you do $11,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500 is too high for me, so I'll try $9,000
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $9,000 is cutting it close to my minimum, but I value finding the right buyer. How about we settle at $10,000 even?
I'm really interested in the product, but $10,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $10,000, so how about $9,500?
